posts.post_content:
Really looking for any southern leaguers. Looking from grades 1-3, preferably 2s and 3s. Also would like raw ones in the good to very good range. Thank you!

Looking for in particular: 
Fritz
Revelle 
Hooker
Manion 
Shaughnessy
Persons

ETC. 

Always looking for Hindus too.
Friendly bump. Also looking for Home Run Baker even though he's not a southern Leaguer
Darn, Wazoo, I wish I had known you were looking for the Shag. For The Love of the Game had two real nice ones up on their auction, but it ended today. :(
